mapper.update: update LAB_SY_SAMPLE set SY_ID = #{syId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_ID = #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_POSTION = #{samplePostion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_FLAG = #{standardFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select lss.* from LAB_SY_SAMPLE lss left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_ID = lss.SAMPLE_ID where 1=1 and lsid.delete_flag = '0'

select lss.*, lsid.CASE_ID as caseId, lsid.SAMPLE_NO as sampleNo, lsid.SAMPLE_NAME as sampleName, lsid.SAMPLE_TYPE as sampleType, sam.case_id as caseId from LAB_SY_SAMPLE lss left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_ID = lss.SAMPLE_ID left join lims_sample_info_dna sam on sam.sample_id = lsid.SAMPLE_ID where SY_ID = #{syId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lsid.delete_flag = '0' and (lsid.SAMPLE_STATUS = '02' or lsid.SAMPLE_STATUS = '03') order by lsid.SAMPLE_FLAG asc, lsid.SAMPLE_NO asc

select lss.*, lsid.SAMPLE_NO as sampleNo, lsid.SAMPLE_NAME as sampleName, lsid.SAMPLE_TYPE as sampleType from LAB_SY_SAMPLE lss left join LIMS_SAMPLE_INFO_DNA lsid on lsid.SAMPLE_ID = lss.SAMPLE_ID WHERE lss.SAMPLE_ID = #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY lss.CREATE_DATETIME DESC
